questions.questionText: Which of the following is true?
answerText: PVC’s are triggered by atrial impulses
All PVC’s require an extensive workup
PVC’s have a wide QRS complex

questions.questionText: Which of the following is FALSE?
answerText: Sustained VT is one of the complications of an MI
The degree of symptoms depends on the rate
Sustained, polymorphic VT often degenerates to VF

questions.questionText:
Which of the following medications can prolong the QT interval?





Erythromycin
